name: Cat-Astrophe (FutureStateMachine)
description:
If a cat and a caticorn could have a soccer match, chasing balls of wool, it would probably look like this cute little game.

A fun two player game bursting with adorable cuteness.  I hope you have fun playing it with a friend!

This is a solo project made by Pranee McKinlay for #NotGDCJam2019 using the suggested theme, MINIMALISM.  Royalty free music from www.bensound.com was used as background playing music.  Thanks Bensound, you're rad!

Recommended resolution is 1920 x 1080.  Please consider buying me a coffee by donating if you like what you see so that I can continue to make quirky independent games.  You're welcome to play for free too, no pressure either way!  I just want you to have fun!

Enjoy!

Player Controls:

Player 1:  (WASD)

Left = A

Right = D

Up = W

Down = S

Player 2: (Arrow Keys)

Left =  "Left Arrow"

Right =  "Right Arrow"

Up = "Up Arrow"

Down =  "Down Arrow"
